entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problems accessing StaticResource from merged resource dictionaries when using MAUI Embedded in iOS #19959
  • StackLayout/Grid adds extra padding when there's a Border inside #19958
  • [iOS] Sticky header panel covers content in a scrollview when using ReturnType="Next" on Entry fields #19956
  • Flyout doesn't load the page after navigating back #19955
  • Issue when using BindableLayout and Entry/Editor with special characters #19954
  • [Android] App crashes after adding a custom control #19953
  • [Android] ToolbarItem shows incorrect image on different pages on initial load when used in Shell #19950
  • Adding a Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged handler does not work on Android 14 #19949
  • .NET 8 iOS app build error when using Xamarin.Firebase.iOS.Core NuGet: bitcode_strip: missing argument(s) #19946
  • GetTypeNameFromCustomNamespace does not cache duplicate results #19944
  • RadioButton TextColor doesn't change iOS/MacCatalyst #19943
  • [Windows] Blazor Hybrid flickers on launch (white, then gray background) #19942
  • After migrating to .NET8, mobile app has issues building on Visual Studio only on Windows #19939
  • `<ScrollView>` lags and stutters when many `<Label>` Text updates happen periodically while trying to scroll on physical `iOS` device #19938
  • [IOS] Child Element Properties (e.g., Height) Not Updating Dynamically within LayoutControl (StackLayout/FlexLayout) when Modified at Runtime #19937

Closed

  • Project Requires Installation of .Net Workloads: Maui-Tizen #19719
  • MediaPicker CapturePhotoAsync broken on Android in nightly builds #19821
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Databinding errors on ListView - What am I doing wrong? #19873

PullRequests

Created

  • Create devcontainer.json #19947
    community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [XC] only generate the services that'll be used #19945
  • [iOS] Add iOS17 tests again #19941
  • [iOS] Update to stable iOS for xcode 15.1 #19940

Merged

  • Update bug-report.yml to 8.0.6 #19952
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx-sr1' into main #19936

Updated

  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 SR3
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, stale, Under Consideration
  • Rectify the scopes in the builder #19932
  • Propagate the app theme to all children #19931
  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, stale, .NET 8 SR2
  • Ignore ScrollRectToVisible if KeyboardAutoManagerScroll is enabled in ItemsViewController #19875
    community ✨
  • IndicatorView IndicatorTemplate Binding #19004
    area/collectionview 📃, community ✨, stale
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #19907
  • [iOS][NativeAOT] Adding NativeAOT RunOniOS device test #19923
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/testing, .NET 9 Planning
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    community ✨
  • [WinUI] Add workaround for Connectivity check on Win10 #19261
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, area/desktop 🖥️, partner/cat 😻
  • Fix modal page push in immersive mode #19903
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
